String.string: Use [W], [S], [A], [D] keys to move your character.
Left-click to attack.
Right-click to use a different skill.
Use Shadow Turn by right-clicking your mouse [MR].
Acquired a piece of equipment. Open your Inventory [I].
New skills are available to learn! Press [K].
Use [W], [S], [A], [D] keys to move your character.
Use Counter by right-clicking your mouse [MR].
You can defend yourself from frontal attacks with the Counter skill.
You can stagger enemies by using Counter after using Punch once.
Punch once, then use Counter.
You can suspend an enemy in the air by using Counter after using Punch skill twice.
Punch twice, then use Counter.
You can pull enemies closer by using Counter after using Punch three times.
Punch three times, then use Counter.
You can knock down an enemy by using Counter after using Punch four times.
Punch four times, then use Counter.
You can dodge an enemy attack by using Quick Dash.
Your Rage is full! Aim at a target and use Rampage.
You can now use a Rage Skill.
New skills are available to learn! Press [K].
Press [1] to place a decoy and teleport behind the Ghilliedhu for a back attack.
Face towards the direction you want jump, then press [C].
Detonate the Runemarks on your target.
Use Leaping Slash.
Using Slash four consecutive times resets the cooldown of Leaping Slash.
Cooldown is reset. Use Leaping Slash again.
